name: Permanence Break
description:
A puzzle game where certain objects stop existing and others only exist while you're looking away. Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

Created by Myles Marr and Gabriel Bacon

Camera sensitivity and audio volume can be adjusted in the pause menu
